hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]



$9$ members each paid $\$8$.

We can multiply to find the amount collected from members.   

$9\times8=\$\blueD{72}$

options.alt: A rectangle divided into two unequal parts. The first part is smaller than the second part. The first part is labeled 72 and Paid by members and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled 9 times 8. The second part is labeled Car wash and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled 178. A curved bracket below the entire rectangle is labeled with a question mark. !

hints.content:
Amount from $\blueD{\text{members}}$ $+$ amount from $\maroonD{\text{car wash}}$ $=$ $\greenD{\text{total money raised}}$

$\blueD{72} + \maroonD{178}= \greenD{250}$
We have raised $\$250$ for our trip.

question.content:
Our skating club is going on a field trip. To cover the cost of the trip we are collecting $\$8$ from each of the $9$ members of the club. We also raised $\$178$ at a car wash. 

**How much money have we raised for our trip all together?**
  
$\$$ [[☃ input-number 1]]
